name: Water Wells for All
mission: Deliver clean water access to remote villages through solar-powered wells.

donationNeeds.summary: Fund the next three solar wells in Northern Kenya.

items.label: Solar pump and filtration kit
items.description: Complete kit including solar pump, storage tank, and filtration.

goals.title: Well Project 2024
goals.description: Deploy three solar wells in Baringo and Turkana counties.

transparencyUpdates.title: Two wells completed
transparencyUpdates.description: Clean water flowing for 1,200 people across two villages.

name: STEM Sisters Initiative
mission: Equip girls with coding tools, mentorship, and scholarship pathways.

donationNeeds.summary: Launch the 2024 mentorship cohort with devices and travel support.

items.label: Laptop grants for students
items.description: Provide laptops and connectivity kits for 40 girls.

goals.title: Cohort 6 scholarships
goals.description: Provide hardware and internet access to 40 future technologists.

transparencyUpdates.title: Mentorship kickoff
transparencyUpdates.description: 20 mentors matched with students across five countries.

name: Harvest Together
mission: Regenerate soil health with climate-smart farming cooperatives.

donationNeeds.summary: Scale regenerative pilot to 50 additional acres across two cooperatives.

items.label: Compost and drip irrigation kits
items.description: Supply composting equipment and efficient irrigation hardware.

goals.title: Harvest 2024 cohort
goals.description: Train 120 farmers on regenerative agriculture practices.

transparencyUpdates.title: Soil health results
transparencyUpdates.description: Average soil organic matter increased by 2.4 points after 8 months.
